website_summaries.verdict: Ideal for those who want to use hot wax at home, but don’t have the storage space for a plug-in warmer.
pros: Users rave that the short, natural ingredient list – lemon, salt, and sugar – comes in a reusable microwaveable container

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend for those with thin/fine hair and with those with ...
customer_reviews.text: Would recommend for those with thin/fine hair and with those with sensitive skin. Pros: Easy to directions to follow Easy to use Easy clean up. Not a sticky mess that is impossible to clean up Comes in a reusable microwaveable container Had enough leftover to do a second round on my legs Did not irritate my skin Cons: Does not come with enough strips It missed patches of hair. (My hair is super fine and could have been user error)
customer_reviews.author: Mai S.

customer_reviews.title: Easy, easy easy!
customer_reviews.text: This wax was a revelation! It was SOOO easy to use and I absolutely LOVE the fact that you simply wash off any residue. This is a huge improvement from the hard wax I used to use that was a pain in the neck to heat up and impossible to completely clean off. In addition I found this wax to be significantly less painful than others I've tried. I'll NEVER go back to the other kinds. I do agree with other reviewers that you should order the extra muslin strips. I went through the ones included here in one leg waxing. I will definitely order this product again!
customer_reviews.author: Escapist Reader

customer_reviews.title: Caused acne everywhere it was applied
customer_reviews.text: First of all this seems like a quality product, it applies easy and isn't all that painful. But after following the instructions word for word I ended up with my entire chest and stomach covered in acne and a rash. This was my first time ever using wax and so I made sure to follow the instructions to the T. I even went YouTube to watch videos to make sure I knew what I was doing before hand and yet I still have whiteheads and a bright red rash all over my chest and stomach. It's disgusting, and I would not recommend this product to anyone. Needless to say I will NEVER wax again.
customer_reviews.author: N. McK

customer_reviews.title: Are you a man searching for the right wax for your hairy body? Look no further.
customer_reviews.text: Male reviewer here with a hairy chest. Used this product to remove thick chest hair, and it works like a charm. Follow the directions and look up some videos first before your first time! There’s definitely a method to doing it, and if done right it absolutely works. I’d strongly recommend buying extra waxing paper strips, as the ones provided probably won’t be enough (there weren’t enough for me). The wax is a sugar/honey type mixture, and can be pretty messy, but cleans up very easily with a wet washcloth. It’s the first wax I bought for myself, and the only I’ve ever used because it gets the job done. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Max E. Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Painful, sticky, blood blistery
customer_reviews.text: I never leave bad reviews and have a ver high pain tolerance, but this is just not worth it. I read and followed all directions and the hair came off in (VERY) painful patches, leaving much of the wax on my skin. I also got blood blisters in most of the pores where it did pull the hair. I will not be using this product again and do not recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Chadam

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product, easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I had never used any kind of waxing product before and was afraid it would be complicated or messy. While this can be a tad messy if you're not careful, it's basically made of honey so it washes off fairly easily (as compared to a waxier substance). It works very well for hair removal and it's simple to use. It doesn't come with many strips though so be sure and purchase extra. Another tip is to apply only a very thin coat. If it's too thick, it doesn't work nearly as well. For this reason, a little goes a long way. This is definitely my new favorite way to remove unwanted hair.
customer_reviews.author: DebbieL800

customer_reviews.title: Things I love about it
customer_reviews.text: Been using this for a year or so to occasionally wax my chest and stomach. Things I love about it: Does not have to be scalding hot in order to work Is natural Is safe/non-toxic Is environmentally friendly Is easy to use Is very effective What I don't like Muslin strips need to be thrown away or rinsed off after use, which adds to the cost to use The plastic container is non-eco friendly
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work for me
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work for me. Followed instructions exactly and even tried alternative ways but the wax just stuck to the skin and I was unable to rip the wax and hair off. Too sticky.
customer_reviews.author: Ian

customer_reviews.title: Got hair off, but because it didn't pull off ...
customer_reviews.text: Got hair off,but because it didn't pull off to the root ended up with a lot of ingrown hairs,thought something might be up when it hurt way less than other waxing but I won't be using again took weeks to get rid of all the bumps on my chest,think it should be stronger to get all the hair follicles out
customer_reviews.author: Todd Stroud

customer_reviews.title: No thank you.
customer_reviews.text: I'm rarely unhappy with purchases but this wax was a complete waste of money. I read and followed directions carefully. The hair would only be removed in tiny sections or not at all. It also left part of my skin in blood blisters. Maybe a more seasoned waxer could get better results but I was not pleased and would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jillian

customer_reviews.title: Still hairy.
customer_reviews.text: I should have known better than to think removing unwanted hair would be easy. This is a big hot mess (literally) and I would not recommend this to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Deadpoet

customer_reviews.title: Super easy to use and clean up.
customer_reviews.text: Very good product and easy to use. Hair free for 6 weeks now. Easy clean up. I read a few reviews of buyers not caring for the product, it is easy to use! Need to know “how” to wax ! You tube tutorials and good to go.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This cold wax is superior to most of the waxes used by me
customer_reviews.text: This cold wax is superior to most of the waxes used by me. Unlike the others, it is very gentle and easy to use. It seems as though I have to wax more often with Sugar Wax, but that is not a problem, since the whole process takes so little time -- and there's little mess. Possibly, more strips could be added to the product. The other thing I do is use the "pre-wax" cleaning and prep prior to using this product. That really makes the process more pain-free.
customer_reviews.author: Billie Fraser

customer_reviews.title: When this works it really works, when it doesn't it's a mess.
customer_reviews.text: I only use this on my bikini and armpits. No matter how long I let my leg hair grow it never seems able to grip it. I've come to the conclusion that maybe the hair needs to be coarse to be gripped regardless of length. It's fantastic on the bikini and armpits, no irritation and very smooth. Although sometimes there's one patch that it doesn't get no matter how many times I go over it and then I end up having to shave or pluck which is annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Jenna Benna

customer_reviews.title: Very good wax and did it's job
customer_reviews.text: This wax worked very well. My only complaint would be that it cools off and hardens in the container kind of quickly, so you might have to reheat during your wax. Also it does not come with enough strips, but you can buy those separately. Very good wax and did it's job.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie Cardwell

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: This was my second experience home waxing. The first was horrible. This time was a lot better, the product works wonderfully. It goes on easy, removes easy and takes away the hair efficiently. I would recommend buying extra cloth strips if you are doing a larger area such as legs, I had to to work in increments as the number of strips were not enough for 1 full leg. The strips are reusable, a little hot water and the wax and hair disappear. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Snowangel

customer_reviews.title: Uninitiated be warned.
customer_reviews.text: As a hairy guy I thought I would try this. After experimenting with this I can say that it did not go well. Only some hair came up. My hair might have been to long to let it get to the base or maybe I used to much or to little. Don't know. I felt the better option was to shave chest and that went well. Itchy for a day. Product may be fine but knowledge of the process may be key. If you have doubts on your knowledge on how this works be warned.
customer_reviews.author: TG100

customer_reviews.title: Best Wax Hands Down.
customer_reviews.text: I’m a first time waxer and definitely never going back to anything else. I ordered both this and the hard wax and 100% prefer the sugar wax as far as less pain and it gets way more hairs per strip. Also love that the sugar wax absorbs easily with water. This specific wax was also the only one I could find that can be used (basically) in all areas. 10/10 if you wax I’d recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rabenold

customer_reviews.title: works great on thin hair
customer_reviews.text: works great on thin hair! i just wash the stick and cloths (the ingredients are just sugar so you don't have to worry about it clogging anything), air-dry them, and reuse them another time instead of buying a whole bunch to throw away, since they're just for myself anyway. you can't really reuse the wax much in my experience the way you can with hot wax, but this is So much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Favorite Sandwiches

customer_reviews.title: The package came really quickly and the wax worked great! I definitely plan to buy some more when ...
customer_reviews.text: The package came really quickly and the wax worked great! I definitely plan to buy some more when this one runs out. The only request would be to include more of the paper strips as we went through those pretty quickly and had to use the back sides of them.
customer_reviews.author: Cool Carey

customer_reviews.title: this is the best thing I have EVER tried
customer_reviews.text: Woow, this is the best thing I have EVER tried!!! the results are just unbelievable. I am so glad got this but what I didn't like that much is that I got two kits and they are all gone :/ wish this was less expensive if I will have to get another two kits in the very near future :(
customer_reviews.author: Cutie pie

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Okay so this product seems nice and everything but it doesn’t work. The sugar wax is not adhesive enough to pull out all the hair. But, it taste pretty good 😂. The 10 strips and 2 sticks aren’t enough. Save your time and the pain and by the real wax or the veet strips at CVS
customer_reviews.author: Grant

customer_reviews.title: Works great! Great value
customer_reviews.text: My girlfriend and I wax each other and it works great. Far better value than going to a waxing salon. Definitely, buy the 100 additional strips.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Bodyhonee vs Vidasleek
customer_reviews.text: Used the previous version of this product that was branded as “bodyhonee”. This «vidasleek” version of the product seems to have oil added to help it spread more easily, but looks like it doesn’t remove as good as the previous version because of this oil added. Bodyhonee version would get 5 stars! Vidasleek is ok, but you’ll have to deal with some hairs that product didn’t remove.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No returns?
customer_reviews.text: Good luck purchasing a trash item because you won’t be able to receive an exchange or refund. Poor quality. The wax doesn’t pull out all of the hairs and leaves too much mess behind. I do NOT recommend this product to anyone. Scam.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: I only want to give 4 stars because I find it hard to say I love something that causes me so much temporary pain
customer_reviews.text: It works, I only want to give 4 stars because I find it hard to say I love something that causes me so much temporary pain.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew David Thimmig

customer_reviews.title: smoother than a baby's bottom
customer_reviews.text: Great for removing back hair and other thicker hair. The residue wipes off easily and doesn't stick like other brands do. My only gripe would be that it doesn't come with a whole lot of strips. It left my skin very smooth and did not irritate my skin at all other than the little redness expected. Does it hurt? Is hair being pulled out not supposed to?
customer_reviews.author: n@nd0

customer_reviews.title: Give this a try, you will be glad you did!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product. Decided to try this after having trouble with other wax--and am REALLY glad I did. SO easy to use, so easy to remove. The best part of this product is that it washes right off your hands or anything else you get it on--I plan on purchasing more to use in the future. Two Thumbs UP!!
customer_reviews.author: waboo

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product! The sugar wax was effective and gentle and did not leave any red or irritated areas on my skin. The wax heated up in only a few seconds and stayed warm enough to use the entire time I was waxing without reheating. There was no mess to clean up at all and it removed every hair. Definitely one of the best waxing products I have ever used. :-)
customer_reviews.author: Christopher F.

customer_reviews.title: Not a bad product but didn't do as well as we thought ...
customer_reviews.text: Not a bad product but didn't do as well as we thought instead we bought hard wax which did much better and there was only enough to do a small section of the body a chest after that we still had to shave and touch ups.
customer_reviews.author: Trevors Corner

customer_reviews.title: I love this! I switched to sugar wax after using ...
customer_reviews.text: I love this! I switched to sugar wax after using regular wax and finding it almost impossible to remove. If you get this all over it's still pretty easy to clean up. You can either buy more strips, or (since this is sugar) rip up an old Tshirt and use that as strips instead and just wash them in between uses!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: Waxed my friend’s back. I’m a cosmetologist so I had some idea what I’m doing. This stuff exceeded my expectations and left him ultra-smooth! Notes: I used almost the entire jar in one sitting and like 3x the supplies included. Do not forget to use powder, it makes all the difference. Cleanup was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First time waxer - excellent product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually take the time to write reviews for products but this review is warranted. I did a ton of research on at home waxing kits before I purchased this one and I am 100% satisfied with BodyHonee Sugar Wax. All waxing is going to hurt a little no matter what product you use. But I barely felt a sting with this. I also used a small amount of talc powder (as recommended with over reviews) before I used the wax. Results are outstanding. I highly recommend this product to anyone looking to do some at home waxing. Its a process for bigger areas of the body (legs and arms) but completely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: kristen lopresti

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, no rash, read directions
customer_reviews.text: Read directions and worked great. There is information in directions that you need to know such as which direction to apply and which direction to pull off. Followed directions, worked flawlessly and NO RASH! Worked great. Half jar left after doing my back and enough strips, sticks to last a lifetime.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Burks

customer_reviews.title: Needs More Strips/doesn’t last
customer_reviews.text: I want to give this a 5 star review, but honestly the fact that it comes with SO few strips is kind of what ruins it for me. We couldn’t finish my back and had to use a razor for the rest. It’s now been about 3 weeks and all the hair is visible again. It’s not back completely but i’m going to either need to wax again or shave because it’s not cute.
customer_reviews.author: Hunter Hanthorn

customer_reviews.title: Sticky, ineffective, and painful
customer_reviews.text: This is pretty bad quality. I ended up throwing mine away after a couple attempted uses. Really doesn’t work well and is more painful than others. I recommend trying a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: T.J. Checketts

customer_reviews.title: This product worked great!!
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great!!!! We used for my husbands back and it was very easy and clean with little pain!
customer_reviews.author: ebal

customer_reviews.title: ... time using any type of wax and it worked pretty well. But I have one issue
customer_reviews.text: It was my first time using any type of wax and it worked pretty well. But I have one issue, it sometimes doesn't get all the hair. Instead of plucking the hair from the follicles it just ends up breaking the hair leaving it with a shaved outcome instead of a waxed one. Overall it was great!
customer_reviews.author: Carmella

customer_reviews.title: Just ok.
customer_reviews.text: Not enough strips, worked ok though. But could only do basically 1 leg. Like any other wax I’ve ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warning!!
customer_reviews.text: Not quite sure how I feel about this yet. Only could do just a bit bit downstairs before having to take a timeout. I knew that it would hurt a lot, but it hurts even more than that.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Product. This is my first time waxing and it was so easy to use by following step by step instructions. Just that the Waxing strips that came with product were not sufficient. It's good that i had ordered for a separate Waxing strip along with this product. Overall, very satisfied with BodyHonee and am about to place another order :)
customer_reviews.author: Ash

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this product. Did not remove hair effectively at all. I had to keep going over the same areas multiple times and still did not remove all the hair. Eventually gave up and threw the remaining wax in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Earl Lilly

customer_reviews.title: Gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I used this product to help a friend wax his chest and I was impressed by the results. It was a very simple, easy process but make sure you completely follow the instructions, I don't think the outcome would have been the same if I had not followed the instructions correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Painful but worked!
customer_reviews.text: It worked well, but was extremely painful. It was my first time waxing, and the last. Threw it away half way through but the actual product did work.
customer_reviews.author: DeSteveo

customer_reviews.title: Buy, buy, buy!
customer_reviews.text: Ive tried many waxes, and none of them worked very well. I used this wax for my bikini line, and I was impressed! I could wax myself (it still hurt) but it didn't take near the effort of some waxes that I have tried. I suggest buying extra wax strips though, because it doesn't come with enough.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: So Easy
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It's easy to heat up, literally 30 seconds in the microwave. And not to mention easy clean up, Icky and stickiness gone by just wiping it off with damp cloth. It does however takes a few tries sometimes to take the hair off, but I believe it might just be me being too impatient and not waiting for the wax to dry enough.
customer_reviews.author: Fantasy Reader

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived promptly, and as advertised. It worked well. It’s easier to use than other waxes I’ve tried. Cleanup was much easier than others - just jump in shower and clean off. Will buy again in the future.
customer_reviews.author: RBC

customer_reviews.title: Mow your lawn
customer_reviews.text: My man hood looks great now. We expect her to mow the lawn so why not us men? Mow your lawn, you better half will thank you. Oh yea, it hurts in the mow-able areas. On my ears and other random areas guys get hair it's fine. Mow men, mow....
customer_reviews.author: HisXlency

customer_reviews.title: Leaked - lid stuck!
customer_reviews.text: I just opened the box and turns out it the wax had leaked out and the lid is stuck down - I can’t open it! A waste of money. Unfortunately I passed the return date.
customer_reviews.author: Alpal

customer_reviews.title: not for men
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE LIGHT BROWN BODY HAIR WITCH SEEMS TO BE TOO CORUS FOR THIS PRODUCT. IT REMOVED MORE SKIN THAN HAIR . I TRIED 3 DIFFERENT AREAS AND HAD BLEEDING ON ALL 3 SPOTS. I DO NOT THINK THIS PRODUCT SHOULD BE LISTED FOR MEN.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Excellent! Great for beginners!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried three other wax systems and this one is the best I have found and no plans to look for another!!I really appreciate the simple ingredients and the directions. I do recommend that if you plan to do a full wax job that you buy additional strips though.
customer_reviews.author: Pleasant Grove Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy cleanup
customer_reviews.text: So much easier than wax based products. Just take a shower and it's all gone.
customer_reviews.author: akaStacy

customer_reviews.title: Did NOT Work
customer_reviews.text: I tried the item 2 times. Followed the directions and it removed very few hairs. Better to try Duct Tape than this product for the same poor results.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised!
customer_reviews.text: I was nervous to try a home wax kit, since I have always shaved. But I was pleasantly surprised at how easy this was to use and how effective it was! In order to do both of my legs, I ended up having to microwave it again about halfway through. But I didn't expect it to stay warm and soft the entire time. My legs did turn slightly pink afterwards, but lotion helped calm that downright away. I think I may be a convert from shaving!
customer_reviews.author: Lori Walker

customer_reviews.title: Best Hair Remover
customer_reviews.text: Very good wax...easy application, great hair removal, and easy cleanup. Like others have said, use talcum powder before applying the wax, and the results will be better (and with less pain!) I use this to wax my chest/torso and wife uses in bikini area...we're both very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: 100% natural
customer_reviews.text: I really love this waxing kit. It's really easy to use, and I love the fact that it's natural – only contain lemon juice sugar. It may take a while to get used​ to it, but I feel that I have become a pro. This is my second tub.
customer_reviews.author: HelloCookie

customer_reviews.title: Painful but works
customer_reviews.text: The product is really a must have in any guy's grooming kit. I use this to keep my chest, stomach, and pubic area smooth. The first time i used this product it was painful, it gets slightly better over time. It is not a very messy product to use, but i only use it when I have a significant amount of hair to remove not just a few stray hairs. I would recommend an epilator to compliment this product. The epilator can allow you to go many more days without having to wax. Ive been able to go 2 months between waxes by using the epilator to touch up. Also grab extra waxing strips, you are going to need them.
customer_reviews.author: sojol howlader

customer_reviews.title: Greaaaaat!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend said this wax is awesome and gets the job done. I haven't tried it yet but can't wait. He did say hair still grows back within a few days but it's cheaper then going to a spa or salon to get it done.
customer_reviews.author: My computer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than normal wax
customer_reviews.text: I will never use normal wax again after using this. My gf loved the results too. The only complaint is I can't get larger amounts and it's fairly expensive in the kit only option.
customer_reviews.author: Brian O.

customer_reviews.title: Easy and effective
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use and does the trick. We will both be using this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mission man

customer_reviews.title: So glad I did
customer_reviews.text: First time self waxing so I was a little nervous, but after reading previous reviews decided to give it a try. So glad I did! After a few minutes of getting the hang of it, product worked just as described. I definitely recommend purchasing the additional waxing strips, not very many included in waxing kit. I purchased this product to use on my arms, and it worked wonderfully. Will definitely be purchasing again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up, very recommended
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this item a couple of items and have been very satisfied every time. As a male, the packaging is simple and the product is ready to use right out of the box. There are plenty of waxing strips and wax available for use. I have had no irritation or issues with this product.
customer_reviews.author: pavianch

customer_reviews.title: read the instructions first
customer_reviews.text: It works great but read the instructions before doing anything I didn't read them and I deserve what I got but After I did read them everything went smoothly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wax.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Works so much better than many other water soluble waxes I have tried, and is a dream product compared to the non-water soluble. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: CFO

customer_reviews.title: So much better and less painful than regular wax. I'm a believer.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great! I was really scared to do my own bikini line because traditional waxing was always so painful. This was great. So much so that i made m younger sister try it out too. She will definitely be getting herself some. Thank you BodyHonee! This Sugar Wax is so great! No more painful itchy razor bumps for me.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Bell

customer_reviews.title: Happy with the results.
customer_reviews.text: Package arrived promptly. I have never used wax before so I have nothing to compare it to but I think it did a great job. So did the one who was doing the waxing and she does have experience. She was really impressed. I would definitely recommend getting additional strips though. I went through all my strips plus a few (I did order extras) while getting my back done. There is enough wax left for 2 or 3 more applications.
customer_reviews.author: Aqwsaqws

customer_reviews.title: Works great And like the fact that’s it’s natural Used to ...
customer_reviews.text: Works great And like the fact that’s it’s natural Used to use other stuff that u put on and wipe off less painful but lots of chemicals in it and would leave my back itchy and would be irritating when shirt on Bodyhonee haven’t had that problem
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: i love the fact that it can be easily cleaned with ...
customer_reviews.text: i love the fact that it can be easily cleaned with water, so all the mess is easily taken care of without any hard work. The only drawback was that once it cooled down it was still spreadable, but then when applied it would be thick layer than what was expected. So had to repeatedly warm it for 10 sec after it cooled down to get the right consistency for waxing.
customer_reviews.author: sarval3025

customer_reviews.title: Anyone can perform this task
customer_reviews.text: Body waxing can cost hundreds of dollars. The body honey kit was simple to use and saves us lots of money. I might also add that the pleasure of ripping hair out of your sweethearts body should not be overlooked.
customer_reviews.author: Indydawson

customer_reviews.title: Fast, Effective, Practically Painless!
customer_reviews.text: easy to use; product works as advertised; great results, doesn't irritate the skin, and is night and day better than painful waxing. The only downside to sugaring versus traditional wax is that the sugar product is a little sticky and has a tendency to get everywhere if you're not careful...but.. it washes off easily, so even that's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: airbus350XWB

customer_reviews.title: LOVE!(:
customer_reviews.text: I am first time waxer, because im sick of shavers and ingrown hairs. This kit makes it so easy!! I dont know why people say waxing is really painful. If you do it correctly, and rip parallel to the skin, it doesnt hurt much. The wax smells little bit sweet, and just had a great experience with this kit!! Definitely buying again!!!(:
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Works very very well. Only heat it up for 30 second vs. a minute with what the directions say. I also used both sides of the strips. I have enough left over for another time besides just picking up some adding strips.
customer_reviews.author: carolyn meuer

customer_reviews.title: First time waxer
customer_reviews.text: Not much to compare this to as this was my first experience using wax for hair removal. My expectations may have been a little high. I followed the directions to the letter and while a majority of hair was removed, it was not a clean removal, meaning I had to go over the same area several times.
customer_reviews.author: PB&J

customer_reviews.title: BodyHonee  Does Not Work - No Return Policy
customer_reviews.text: This product does not work, and it is known as soon as you try it. There is no return policy, so you a stuck with throwing it away. A waste of money. There are home products out there that work much better and are not messy.
customer_reviews.author: Product review 1

customer_reviews.title: works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It worked pretty good on my back, but we ran out of the strips. It would be nice if there were more and they just charged another buck or two.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I've tried every kind of body wax- stripless and strip free, and I've gotten professionally waxed, but this is THE best! Painless, easy cleanup. Don't waste your time or money on anything else (don't buy the hard wax from the same company either)
customer_reviews.author: River

customer_reviews.title: Product worked well, but came with only 10 removal ...
customer_reviews.text: Product worked well, but came with only 10 removal pads. It wasn't enough to to the complete my back and I used a different product to get the job done. It would get 5 stars if more pads were included.
customer_reviews.author: reviewer123

customer_reviews.title: Not so great on medium hairs
customer_reviews.text: It works okay. Definatly remove really really light hairs... Not so great on medium hairs, and definitely no use on thick hairs.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Ease of use
customer_reviews.text: Great product! It was the first time using sugar wax and one needs to be careful with the quantity, but once you get this right, it works perfectly well! No irritation or any other issue with the skin, whatsoever! Definitely recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Bili

customer_reviews.title: Works really well. I've used it on my legs ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well. I've used it on my legs and bikini line. My 14 year old used it on her armpits and my 11 year old did her legs all with very little pain. Results very similar to a Salon for a fraction of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not that particular one I was hoping for but it got the job done
customer_reviews.author: AmazonDemon

customer_reviews.title: Worked as advertised
customer_reviews.text: The product worked as advertised, the only observation is that I wish there were more waxing strips included. We used all of them up and still have at least half of the wax left.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: Not as good on thicker hair. You have to do extra strips for one spot but is very easy to wash off with just soap and water.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Loved this product!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for me! The clean up was so easy too, just warm water. No sticky residue ,like other waxes, that doesn’t come off. Very happy with my purchase! Will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Tapia

customer_reviews.title: it works for me!
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy product because of some of the reviews. Product works fine! Make sure to apply a thin layer, thick layers will make a mess and will not work
customer_reviews.author: Ligen

customer_reviews.title: Its a very good home wax kit
customer_reviews.text: Its a very good home wax kit, but you have to make sure your hair is long enough to wax as stated in the instructions. I was able to wax my arms, but I am still trying figure how to use it on my stomach and chest.
customer_reviews.author: Eric F

customer_reviews.title: The product was mostly easy but left tiny bruises all over my legs and ...
customer_reviews.text: The product was mostly easy but left tiny bruises all over my legs and was really painful the second time using it.
customer_reviews.author: MissLectrix

customer_reviews.title: Easy to useless messy than any of the other wax ...
customer_reviews.text: This wax works perfectly! Easy to useless messy than any of the other wax products I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: As long as you have the time to follow the instructions this product will impress you.
customer_reviews.author: Josh M.

customer_reviews.title: All smiles
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Doesn't rip skin off and no bruising if done correctly with their instructions. The natural ingredients are great on anyone's skin, especially sensitive skin. Does the job right the first time and the strip can be washed to be reused if you prefer to save money. I don't usually leave feedback, but I couldn't help it this time - Super satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: MGrant

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Great product do hurt but no even close to the the non sugar..will buy again and I recommend buying extra removal strips
customer_reviews.author: HARRIS EVERSON

customer_reviews.title: Better than Nads.
customer_reviews.text: I use this regularly now since I can longer find Nads in my local stores. Super great product. Easy to use, easy to clean up. Update--this is the 5th time I have ordered. Still love it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine J. Swistowicz

customer_reviews.title: Works Well
customer_reviews.text: Just wishing there were more strips, other than that, great product
customer_reviews.author: Bronte

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works incredible iv used it for years i love the fact its natural and isnt messy as well as water breaks it down love love love it
customer_reviews.author: Daphne

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Love the wax, works excellent! Only wish that there were more strips included in the kit, but no biggie.
customer_reviews.author: Sarra Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Easy!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great for me! Easy to use and easy to clean up! 😊😊😊
customer_reviews.author: thisdesi

customer_reviews.title: I got this product so I wouldn't have to go ...
customer_reviews.text: I got this product so I wouldn't have to go to a professional. After trying this product, there was no hair removed. I even looked at a YouTube video just in case I was doing something wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Works Great is you have Fine to Medium hair.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, heated it on a stove in a shallow pot with some water. Only bad part is that I ran out of strips. XD Ordered more and they are on the way.
customer_reviews.author: FatalRewind

customer_reviews.title: I normally have better luck with wax kits but this one did not ...
customer_reviews.text: Was hard to use, only used twice because the wax takes a couple of tries to come off. I normally have better luck with wax kits but this one did not seem to do the trick for me. Definitely not buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Anki D

customer_reviews.title: I was worried because I have super sensitive skin
customer_reviews.text: I was worried because I have super sensitive skin. Used this before a vacation and I was pleasantly surprised to see that it didn't irritate my skin much. It was also very easy to use and effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

product_meta.title: Hair Removal Sugar Waxing Kit Men + Women, All Natural (10 oz)
feature_bullets: All Natural Formula made for FINE to MEDIUM Body Hair. NOT for facial, head, nose or ear hair removal.
Water Soluble: Wipes clean with water, Microwavable: 30 Second heating.
Unisex: Made for Men & Women, Leaves skin hair free for up to 6+ weeks.

Not Recommended for those transitioning from shaving to waxing (hair will be too thick and coarse for this product). For thick/coarse body hair, or if transitioning from shaving to waxing, please see our "Spa Wax" Kit.
Not reccomended for facial hair removal, please see our "Hard Wax" kit for facial/bikini/underarm hair removal.
